title: Security Scan Workflow Input
description: Input from n8n previous execution nodes (loop of repositories). One item per repo.

approved.description: Safety gate. Must be true to allow this execution to run scans / clone repos.

repoPath.description: Absolute path to the repository directory to scan (from n8n loop item, e.g. {{ $json.repoPath }}). If omitted, provide repoUrl instead.

repoUrl.description: Optional git URL to clone (e.g. from GitHub node: {{ $json.cloneUrl }}). If provided and repoPath is missing, the workflow will clone/pull into workflow/_repos/<repoName>.

repoName.description: Optional identifier for report naming; defaults to folder name of repoPath

scanContainers.description: Whether to run container/image scans if Dockerfile or image refs are found

allowInstall.description: If true, workflow may propose installing missing scan tools (with approval)

includeRaw.description: If true, embed full raw tool outputs (grype/npm audit) in the JSON report. This can make reports large.
